p: The surface tension was determined on cell-free metabolic liquid obtained by centrifuging (12,000× g for 20 min) and filtration of culture media. Analyses were performed at 25 °C in a Sigma 70 tensiometer (KSV Instruments Ltd., Finland), using the Du Nouy ring method [ 72]. Milli-Q water with surface tension of 72 mN/m was used to calibrate the tensiometer.
